00007 #pragma once
00008 #include "svr/common/basic_manager.h"
00009 #include "svr/common/common_header.h"
00010 #include "svr/common/common_proto.h"
00011 
00013 // ClientConn
00014 class ClientConn : public data::ClientConn
00015 {
00016 public:
00017     using base_type = data::ClientConn;
00018     using key_type = decltype(base_type().conn_head().conn_id());
00019 
00020 public:
00021     bool Serialize(void * buf, size_t buflen, size_t & uselen) const;
00022     bool UnSerialize(void * buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen);
00023     void AfterUnSerialize() { }
00024     size_t GetSize() const { return base_type::ByteSize(); }
00025     key_type GetKey() const { return base_type::conn_head().conn_id(); }
00026     std::string ToString() const;
00027 };
00028 
00030 class ClientConnManager : public BasicManager<ClientConn>, public lsf::basic::Singleton<ClientConnManager> {
00031 public:
00032     using base_type = BasicManager<ClientConn>;
00033     using conn_create_func_type = std::function<void(ClientConn&)>;
00034     using conn_peer_close_func_type = std::function<void(ClientConn&)>;
00035     static const size_t DEF_HEART_BEAT_CHECK_INTERVAL = 30 * 1000;
00036 
00037 public:
00038     bool Init(key_t shm_key, uint32_t max_size, bool enable_uid_index = false);
00039     ClientConn* CreateClientConn(msg::CS const& message);
00040     ClientConn* GetClientConn(uint32_t conn_id);
00041     ClientConn* GetClientConnByUid(uint64_t player_uid);
00042     void ReleaseClientConn(uint32_t conn_id);
00043 
00044 public:
00045     template<typename HandlerType>
00046     void AddClientConnCreateHandle(HandlerType&& handler) {
00047         _conn_create_func_set.push_back(std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00048     }
00049 
00050     template<typename HandlerType>
00051     void AddClientConnPeerCloseHandle(HandlerType&& handler) {
00052         _conn_peer_close_func_set.push_back(std::forward<HandlerType>(handler));
00053     }
00054 
00055 protected:
00056     std::vector<conn_create_func_type> _conn_create_func_set;
00057     std::vector<conn_peer_close_func_type> _conn_peer_close_func_set;
00058     bool _enable_uid_index = false;
00059     std::multimap<uint64_t,uint32_t> _uid_to_conn_id_index;
00060 };
